entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
